text:
See Luis D. Ortiz's daughter Leela begin to take her first steps Luis D. Ortiz’s little girl is on the move! The proud Million Dollar Listing New York dad recently shared a video of his 1-year-old daughter, Leela, beginning to take her very first steps. On April 13, Luis shared a sweet video of the tot moving around, using a toy walker to make her way around the room. Followed closely behind by her mother, Nikita, Leela looked incredibly focused on her walking skills.

The RHOC family shows support for Kara Keough Bosworth after her baby's passing Current cast members of The Real Housewives of Orange County and alums alike are rallying around Jeana Keough's daughter, Kara Keough Bosworth, after she lost her son, McCoy Casey Bosworth, shortly after his birth on.

Adrienne Maloof and Paul Nassif’s twin sons are all grown up and already taller than their dad Adrienne Maloof and Paul Nassif definitely have something to celebrate these days. The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills alums' youngest children, Christian and Collin, just turned 14 years old — and mom and dad couldn't be more proud.

Lisa Rinna says she experienced a coronavirus scare with daughter Delilah Belle Hamlin Lisa Rinna is focusing on the health and well-being of her family as she self-isolates in her Beverly Hills home, along with husband Harry Hamlin, and their daughters Delilah and Amelia, amid the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic.

How self-quarantine changed Andy Cohen’s mind about showing photos of his son on social media Every one's life is different during the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic and the era self-isolating — and that includes the social lives of babies.

Denise Richards makes an unexpected breakfast for her kids in self-quarantine Denise Richards has found the perfect comfort food recipe, and she's sticking to it — morning through night. In a recent interview, The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills mom named the meal she's cooking up most frequently amid self-quarantine: Macaroni and cheese.

Paul Nassif confirms he's expecting a baby with wife Brittany There's a baby on board for Dr. Paul Nassif and wife, Brittany Pattakos. The couple confirmed the happy news on Instagram by sharing sonogram pics of their baby.
